newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stocks seen lower, IBM reports net.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stocks seen lower, IBM reports net.

text.p: Wall Street stocks were expected to come in for some profit-taking at the opening on Monday after reaching for 6100 last week, with most investors focusing on International Business Machines Corp earnings.
IBM reported third quarter net per share of $2.45, $0.02 above the the First Call estimate, and traded up 1/8 at 129-1/2 ahead of the opening.
But the stock had a strong run on Friday in anticipation of the earnings and analysts said they did not expect it to move sharply in trading on Monday.
